short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture HTML elements like headings, meta description, and title.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Bisbi is a tool designed to streamline SEO analysis, focusing on key elements that impact a site's ranking and visibility. The extension provides various functionalities:

Parse HTML: Simplifies the review of web page structure, showing headings, meta descriptions, and page titlesâ€”all critical for SEO.

Title Tags & Image Alt Attributes: Assesses image optimization for SEO and accessibility by analyzing alt attributes, improving visibility in search results.

Links: Evaluates internal and external links to optimize navigation and authority flow, suggesting the use of nofollow on external links to preserve SEO value.

Schema Markup: Helps add structured data (e.g., for articles, products, and businesses) to boost rich snippet generation, improving search engine understanding and display.

Canonical URLs: Ensures proper canonicalization to avoid duplicate content issues and consolidate page authority.

Other Features: Dark Mode, Whois lookup, and mobile compatibility checks are available for user experience and SEO strategy enhancement.

SEO Bisbi helps users implement SEO best practices effortlessly, giving them a competitive edge in search engine rankings.
